mainSequence.step: Author clicks on the "Hide Story" option in the Story Publish View.
The Story Publish View sends a request to the Stories Controller to hide the story.
The Stories Controller processes the request by invoking the DeleteStory() method.
The Stories Controller queries the database for the necessary data.
The database returns the queried data to the Stories Controller.
The Stories Controller formats the response payload.
The formatted response payload is sent back to the Story Publish View.
The Story Publish View displays the Stories Management Page to the Author.
